title: motel ‘97 - 18
body:
➵ pairing: jungkook x reader  
➵ genre: mafia au, angst, fluff, smut.
➵ warning: violence, crude language, read at own risk.
➵ word count: 3.8K+

➵  previous chapter - next chapter

“Just trust me Y/N please..” He said placing his forehead against yours.

“I..” You began, but paused when the sound of car pulling up outside startled you both. “Who’s - ..?”        

     “Y/N kill the lights.. now.”

It was never a good sign when Jungkook was uneasy. If it was something he was scared about, it only meant 10x worse for you. So when he told you turn out the lights upon the arrival of some unknown vehicle, you felt your anxiety go through the roof.

“Who’s..” You questioned as you quickly tiptoed over and shut the light off as Jungkook shut the balcony door and slid the lock shut. “I don’t know. We need to hide. I’ll kill the lights downstairs with the power box in the hall.” Jungkook deadpanned as he quickly disappeared into the hallway, leaving you standing bewildered. 

You turned your head frantically trying to locate a spot to hide as you heard the door to the car slam shut outside. “Y/N come on!” Jungkook whisper-yelled as he stuck his head in the doorway. You blinked a few times before wandering over towards him.

He quickly grabbed your wrist and pulled you down the hallway towards a storage closet when a black blur zoomed past the 2 of you down the stairs, causing you both to back into the walls on either side. 

Feeling as if all air had left your body at that moment, you carefully swung the closet door open and climbed inside, hiding behind a stack of blankets. Looking around, there was barely enough room for you, let alone Jungkook. 

“Uhh.. Okay here I can move these over and sit in them so you can get in.” You whispered as you reached for Jungkook’s hand as he still glared down the staircase.

“No.. I’ll hide somewhere else.” He answered flatly. “There’s no way we will both fit in there. I’ll find somewhere to hide in these rooms.” Jungkook quickly explained as he leaned down to cup your face in his hands. “Whatever you do, do NOT move. I will come back and get you when it’s safe.” Jungkook pleaded. 

He knew you would argue and beg to go with him but he couldn’t afford you getting caught for his sake. “But..” “No Y/N. Please.. Just listen-” Jungkook was cut off by the sound of glass shattering downstairs. 

Pressing a quick kiss to your temple, Jungkook pulled his gun from his waistband, closed the closet door behind him and headed for the stairs. All you could do was watch through the small slots in the door.

Waiting for what seemed like hours, there was still no sign of Jungkook. The house grew eery silent as you pulled your knees into your chest. The hallway was barely illuminated by the glow of the moon through a window, adding even more to the uneasy feeling. 

All you could see through the slots was the wall on the opposite side and about halfway down the stairs. Itching to figure out who it was and what was going on, you slowly inched towards the door and got ready to peer down the stairs when a flash of black shot past, causing you to gasp and fly back into the closet. 

Slapping your hand over your mouth at the sudden sound you made, you feared for your life when you saw the figure backup, stopping just in front of the door.

Your eyes grew wide as you could make out the silhouette of a gun in his hand as he seemingly just stood eyeing the closet as if he could see right through it. Your breathing grew heavy and you tried everything to slow it down, but once the door was ripped open, exposing you to the moonlight and figure, your adrenaline took over. 

Glaring up at the unknown man, you immediately flipped your body around and made a dash for the stairs when the man shot his foot out, tripping you. Taking a large tumble down the wooden set of stairs, you almost didn’t care your head was bleeding and the fall had caused a large gash. 

Scrambling up from the floor, you ran over around the kitchen counter to grab a knife when he shot in your direction, causing a scream to erupt from your throat. Swinging your hands across the counter, you successfully grabbed a decent sized knife and hid on the other side of the kitchen island.

“What’s the matter? You don’t wanna come out and play?” He taunted you as you could hear the click of his boots approaching you. Gripping the knife so hard your knuckles became white, you held the weapon close to your body, ready to stab as he made it around the corner. 

However, he took you by surprise, pinning you to the floor instead, kicking the knife feet away. “Get off!” You yelled through your rigid breathing. Watching as he picked up his gun and aimed it at your abdomen, you used all your strength to push his hand up, and he fired at the ceiling light, causing millions of glass shards to come raining down on the both of you.

Buying yourself some time with the glass shards, you picked up a large chunk and stuck it directly into his thigh. Hearing his blood curdling screams as he immediately retreated, you turned on your stomach, crawling for the knife, cutting your arms in the process. 

Just as you felt the material of the handle of the knife touch your fingertips, you gripped it tightly in your hand, turning and landing a clean slash to the man’s hand as he made an attempt to reach for you once more. 

“You bitch!” He seethed as he reached for his gun once more, but you were quicker this time. Letting out screams of anger, you lost it completely. You charged directly for the man, landing several stabs and lacerations to his abdomen and chest. 

“DON’T EVER TOUCH ME AGAIN!” You screamed as you plunged the knife into his body several more times.

Blood pooled around you and him both, covering not only the floor, but your hands, face, everything. Your hair was even clumped at the ends from being drenched in blood. Sitting over his body, you let the knife drop to the floor, making a metal clank as it did. 

You were too infuriated to even notice you had been crying as well. Your entire body was shaking intensely. Turning your head to take in the mess you had caused, you noticed a figure in the corner of your eye. You slowly turned your head and noticed it was Jungkook.

He stood completely still. Baffled by the scene in front of him. You.. of all people.. Were capable of this? Your eyes traveled down to his hand to see him holding the same pistol from earlier. He had no words. And even if he did, he couldn’t say them. 

So he simply slowly neared you, putting his gun back into his waistband. Your response was just to just stare back at the lifeless body beneath you. His eyes were still open, staring lifelessly at the ceiling. 

His clothes drenched in blood.. His hair stuck to his forehead. You began to feel sick.. Beginning to backpedal away from the body, Jungkook caught you in his arms and lifted you up. “Jungkook I…” You began as you wiped at your forehead. Looking down at your hands, you didn’t even know if it was your blood or his now. And that scared you.

“Shh.. Baby it’s okay..” He comforted. You began to feel panic arise in your chest as the reality of the situation dawned on you. “Jungkook.. Jun- I- I killed.. I killed..” You stuttered like a broken record. 

“It’s okay.. Just breathe.. Look at me..” Jungkook sat in front of you on the floor, holding your hands in his. Your frantic eyes searched for his, fearing he would never look at you the same. 

“That’s it.. Just keep your eyes on me baby..” He breathed out as he rubbed his thumb over your bloodied face.  “I h-had t-to.” You hiccupped as you let your head fall. “I know. I know.” He consoled. He glanced around the room, before pulling his phone out of his back pocket knowing who he needed to call.

Watching as Namjoon and some of his men pulled up in the driveway, you could tell he was genuinely concerned at your state. You stood in front of Jungkook on the porch, not wanting to go back inside until they got rid of the body. You couldn’t stomach what you did..

Watching as Namjoon conversed with his men for a few moments before they charged in the house beneath you and Jungkook, he soon followed. “You say this was one of Yoongi’s?” Namjoon sighed as he stepped in front of Jungkook. He simply nodded, shifting his head to the car next to theirs.

 “Look inside the car. Looks like the guy had plans of returning after whatever he was gonna do here..” Jungkook notified as he shuffled his feet. Namjoon just nodded before waving a guy over to the car. 

“Y/N.. Look I know I’m probably the last face you wanna see right now..” Namjoon wavered, fearing that you’d blow up on him. “But I just wanted to say I’m glad you’re okay kid.” He slowly inched towards you, resting his hand on your shoulder. 

He actually felt shitty that he had brought this upon you. You just nodded and let your head fall into Jungkook’s chest.

“Alright I’ve just arrived boss.” He spoke over the ear piece. He surveyed the building carefully, making mental note of every exit he could see. He noticed the lights shut off upstairs, meaning they were already aware of his presence. 

“Good. Don’t mess this up. Make it quick. In and out. She’s all you’re there for.” He nodded mentally before stepping out the car onto the driveway with his gun already out.

Sliding a window open, he quickly climbed inside, turning against it so he wouldn’t leave his back vulnerable. He had landed in what seemed to be the living room. 

Taking in note of his surroundings, he noticed the staircase leading to upstairs, figuring that’s where you’d be. “Alright I’m in. I’m checking first level then moving up.” He whispered over the ear piece. 

Stalking around the kitchen, office, bathroom, and such downstairs, he found it empty. Was Jungkook not here? Because surely if he was, he would’ve made himself present by now. Oh well, makes my job easier.. He chuckled to himself as he slowly stalked up the stairs.

Looking down the narrow hallway, there was only about 4 rooms you could hide in, and a closet that looked beyond small, so he headed for the rooms first. 

However, hearing a small gasp come from the narrow hideaway, he smirked. Stopping just inches away from the handle, he listened in closely before ripping the door open to reveal your fragile figure.

Following hot on your trail as you made a dash for the stairs, he was quick to shoot his foot out, hearing a loud thump follow as you fell down the steps. 

Running down them after you, he quickly fired a shot into the wall, barely missing your head as you scrambled for that knife. Stupid bitch… He could only think to himself.

Turning the corner of the kitchen island, he quickly pounced on top of you, trailing the gun up your body trying to work you into submission when you suddenly got the upper hand, quite literally. He grunted as you forced his hand up, taking out one of the kitchen lights, bracing his face to avoid the falling glass shards. 

Feeling as if his leg had been set on fire, he quickly applied pressure to the wound on his thigh, growing angrier and angrier by the minute as he also watched you reach for that stupid knife once more.

 Knowing if he couldn’t work you into submission while you were conscious, he reached for his gun again and shot his hand out to grab you, landing a clean laceration to the palm of his hand. “You Bitch!” He called out as he hissed in pain.

But what happened next was something he never thought would be his fate. You had finally gathered enough courage to strike back, plunging the knife in and out of his body. 

He felt his body growing weaker and weaker as each stab became more and more of a fight to keep alive. But on the last few stabs, his body had lost and he registered completely still.

“Dammit!” Yoongi raged as he slammed his ear piece down on his desk, shattering it to pieces. He couldn’t believe everything he had just heard. One of his men, dead, at the hands of you.

 It almost made Yoongi laugh in hysterics, but then again this only meant reconstruction for his plans. Calling in his other reinforcements, he lined up a proposal for each and every one of them. 

Watching as they all filed into his office, Yoongi smirked knowing damn well this was only a minor set back. “Back to the drawing board boys..” He announced as they all seated..

Sitting outside in pure silence for about 20 minutes was making you extremely anxious. You watched as Jungkook conversed with Namjoon as they stood outside that unfamiliar vehicle as his men searched it. 

What did he think of you..? Does he still love me..? How could anyone after this.. You let a million questions wander in your mind before one of Namjoon’s men stepped outside alerting everyone. “Namjoon it’s done.” He announced. 

Jungkook turned nodding to the man before turning and walking back to you. “Hey.. let’s go back inside. I’ll get you cleaned up.” Jungkook softly spoke. You just followed behind him as you made your way back up the porch and inside as Namjoon and his men left.

Standing inside the bathroom as Jungkook started up a shower for you both, you still stood completely numb to it all. “Alright.. Let’s get you cleaned up.” Jungkook somewhat mumbled as he rid himself of his shirt. You still stood completely still as he stalked up to you. 

He let his hands linger around your waist, not wanting to lift your shirt just yet if you weren’t comfortable. “Y/N please talk to me.” Jungkook pleaded as he searched your face for any sort of emotion. You could see the hurt in his eyes, but you were still too scared. 

“Just say something. Please. Anything.” He let his arms fall to his side in defeat. Watching as you still stood vacant, he sighed and turned around to head for the door. 

“Wait.” You quickly chimed. Even if you didn’t want to talk, you still needed him here with you. “I’ll talk.. I’ll talk.. Just don’t leave me please..” You stuttered as your fidgeted with your shirt.

“I won’t leave you…” Jungkook responded quickly as he made he was back over towards you. You slowly began to peel your bloody shirt off, but struggled with the cuts on your arms. 

“Here..” Jungkook whispered from behind you as he helped you lift it off with ease. The 2 of you just stood against each other for a moment before Jungkook spoke against your neck. “I’d never leave you.. And that’s a promise.” He spoke muffled into your skin as he left small butterfly kisses along the way. 

“I know.. I know you’re scared right now. And you think you’re some monster..” You closed your eyes at his words. It sounded even worse coming from him than it did in your own head.

“But you aren’t. You did it to survive Y/N.” He turned you around to face him. “It’s like you told me.. Just because you were dealt some bad cards doesn’t mean it defines you.” He pulled you into his bare chest, letting his hand rest on the back of your head. 

“I can’t stop thinking about it..” You broke down. “He was already dead and.. And I couldn’t stop myself. I felt as if he would just come back and kill me and..” Jungkook pulled your head back to face him and pressed a soft kiss to your lips. 

You froze at the sudden contact, but slowly eased into it before he pulled away. “You did what you had to do.. And I’m sorry I couldn’t have been there sooner.. I went to check the perimeter outside but once I heard your screams..” Jungkook closed his eyes as if the memory had pained him. 

“I thought..” He choked up on his own words and you could see tears welling in his eyes. “I thought I lost you.. And it would’ve been my fault for leaving you there..” Jungkook murmured as he pulled you into him once more.

“You didn’t lose me.. It’s okay..” You consoled as you rubbed your hands up and down his back. It’s usually what you did to calm him down when you two cuddled. 

Slowly letting your arms fall as Jungkook pulled back to cup your face, you looked him in the eyes. “You know how much I love you right..?” Jungkook sniffled as he softly rubbed his thumb against your cheek once more. 

“Even like this?” You let a small smile break as he had seemingly forgotten about your appearance. “Even like this.” He leaned down, pressing a kiss to your lips once more. “Now how about that shower?” He smiled as he pressed one more short kiss to your lips.

Laying back in bed now with a new change of clothes and being ridden of the blood that coated your body, you clung tightly to Jungkook. You rested your head on his chest as his arm snaked around your waist holding you in close.

 You both lied still against one another in the dark, listening in closely to the soft sound of each other’s breathing. Listening as your head rose up and down in sync on his chest, you turned over slightly and pressed a small kiss to his chest. 

“I love you.” You mumbled into the fabric of his shirt. “So much..” You deeply inhaled the scent of him as you began to close your eyes. “I love you more.” Jungkook chimed back, as he ran his hands through your hair. 

“I’ll always be here and I’ll always love you no matter what Y/N.” He breathed out as exhaustion fully took over and he inevitably drifted to sleep with you alongside him, safe.

Waking up and reading the clock, 2:45AM, You figured you better get a move on now. Glancing up from your spot beneath him, you watched as Jungkook slept soundly. 

His lips slightly parted, his hair messy and covering his face, his chest rising and falling in sync. It pained you. It pained you to leave him. You didn’t want to. You wanted to stay and be with him for the rest of your life, but you couldn’t.

Slowly unhinging yourself from his arms, you let your feet fall against the carpeted floor and took a deep breath. Grabbing the small suitcase you found in that closet and shoved under the bed the night before, you slowly slid it out, and began to throw in whatever articles of clothing you could. 

Rummaging through the closet as quietly as you could, you came across one of Jungkook’s jackets. Slowly pulling it off the hanger, you held it delicately in your hands and pressed it against your face taking in the smell of him. Letting out a shaky breath as you did so. 

You decided you’d take it with you. Slipping it on over your frame, you zipped it up to hold it as close to your frame as possible. Something to remind you why you were doing this and that you would come back.

Zipping up the suitcase and setting it in the hallway, you quietly made your way back into the room with a pad of paper and a pen. Sitting on the floor at the edge of the bed, you began to write.

Wiping the tears that had began to drip down your face, you carefully rose from the floor and set the pen and paper on the nightstand next to Jungkook’s sleeping figure. 

Quickly wiping your tears, you neared the edge of the bed and pressed a gentle kiss to his forehead. “I love you so much.” You whispered before brushing some of the hair out of his face and backing away.

Not daring to turn around in fear of breaking down, you quietly and quickly exited the room, grabbing your suitcase and the spare keys to one of the cars in the garage. Making your way down the stairs, you let your eyes glance over at the spot where you had killed the man earlier, forcing yourself to face it to know why you were doing this.

Slamming the trunk shut as you loaded your suitcase, you walked around the car, climbing into the driver’s seat. 

Taking in a deep breath as you started the car, you began to reverse out of the driveway, taking in the house one more time, letting your eyes stop on the bedroom window. You really hoped to come back to him. Just like how things were in the beginning.

Taking off down the road, the house just became a mere image in the rearview mirror. Recalling the note you wrote to Jungkook, you let the tears freely fall now, as you knew you couldn’t come back to him this time.

Dear Jungkook,

When you read this you will know I’m gone. And I’m so deeply sorry. I really am. I wish I could be with you. I wish I could be in your arms once more. I wish there could still be an us.

I am writing this to let you know I have left. And I’m not quite sure where to, but I know I’ll be okay. I am so grateful for everything you’ve taught me and the unconditional love you’ve shown me. I won’t forget it or you. You’ve come to be the absolute love of my life despite the situation we were put into. You are the most strongest and beautiful person I know and I’m gonna need you to stay that way, okay? So please don’t worry about me.. Worry about making things right with Namjoon and Yoongi. Worry about making a future that’s safe for you. I know you can do it. I need to take some time to myself and figure out some things. But, I hope that when I return you’ll still be there for me with open arms. No matter how long it may take, or how many obstacles I may run into, I will come back to you. You did it for me, as I will for you. I love you so so so much Jeon Jungkook. Thank you for loving me. I hope to see you soon.”

- Love, Y/N

(A/N: woo! it’s finally finished! i’m def a lot happier about how my writing is coming out since i’m spending much more time on it now. also ngl i def cried while writing this lmaooo but i hope you guys like it! let me know if you do pls! i hope u have a great day/night! thanks!)

Your breathing grew heavy and you tried everything to slow it down, but once the door was ripped open, exposing you to the moonlight and figure, your adrenaline took over. 

Glaring up at the unknown man, you immediately flipped your body around and made a dash for the stairs when the man shot his foot out, tripping you. Taking a large tumble down the wooden set of stairs, you almost didn’t care your head was bleeding and the fall had caused a large gash. 

Scrambling up from the floor, you ran over around the kitchen counter to grab a knife when he shot in your direction, causing a scream to erupt from your throat. Swinging your hands across the counter, you successfully grabbed a decent sized knife and hid on the other side of the kitchen island.

“What’s the matter? You don’t wanna come out and play?” He taunted you as you could hear the click of his boots approaching you. Gripping the knife so hard your knuckles became white, you held the weapon close to your body, ready to stab as he made it around the corner. 

However, he took you by surprise, pinning you to the floor instead, kicking the knife feet away. “Get off!” You yelled through your rigid breathing. Watching as he picked up his gun and aimed it at your abdomen, you used all your strength to push his hand up, and he fired at the ceiling light, causing millions of glass shards to come raining down on the both of you.

Buying yourself some time with the glass shards, you picked up a large chunk and stuck it directly into his thigh. Hearing his blood curdling screams as he immediately retreated, you turned on your stomach, crawling for the knife, cutting your arms in the process. 

Just as you felt the material of the handle of the knife touch your fingertips, you gripped it tightly in your hand, turning and landing a clean slash to the man’s hand as he made an attempt to reach for you once more. 

“You bitch!” He seethed as he reached for his gun once more, but you were quicker this time. Letting out screams of anger, you lost it completely. You charged directly for the man, landing several stabs and lacerations to his abdomen and chest. 

“DON’T EVER TOUCH ME AGAIN!” You screamed as you plunged the knife into his body several more times.

Blood pooled around you and him both, covering not only the floor, but your hands, face, everything. Your hair was even clumped at the ends from being drenched in blood. Sitting over his body, you let the knife drop to the floor, making a metal clank as it did. 

You were too infuriated to even notice you had been crying as well. Your entire body was shaking intensely. Turning your head to take in the mess you had caused, you noticed a figure in the corner of your eye. You slowly turned your head and noticed it was Jungkook.

He stood completely still. Baffled by the scene in front of him. You.. of all people.. Were capable of this? Your eyes traveled down to his hand to see him holding the same pistol from earlier. He had no words. And even if he did, he couldn’t say them. 

So he simply slowly neared you, putting his gun back into his waistband. Your response was just to just stare back at the lifeless body beneath you. His eyes were still open, staring lifelessly at the ceiling. 

His clothes drenched in blood.. His hair stuck to his forehead. You began to feel sick.. Beginning to backpedal away from the body, Jungkook caught you in his arms and lifted you up. “Jungkook I…” You began as you wiped at your forehead. Looking down at your hands, you didn’t even know if it was your blood or his now. And that scared you.

“Shh.. Baby it’s okay..” He comforted. You began to feel panic arise in your chest as the reality of the situation dawned on you. “Jungkook.. Jun- I- I killed.. I killed..” You stuttered like a broken record. 

“It’s okay.. Just breathe.. Look at me..” Jungkook sat in front of you on the floor, holding your hands in his. Your frantic eyes searched for his, fearing he would never look at you the same. 

“That’s it.. Just keep your eyes on me baby..” He breathed out as he rubbed his thumb over your bloodied face.  “I h-had t-to.” You hiccupped as you let your head fall. “I know. I know.” He consoled. He glanced around the room, before pulling his phone out of his back pocket knowing who he needed to call.

Watching as Namjoon and some of his men pulled up in the driveway, you could tell he was genuinely concerned at your state. You stood in front of Jungkook on the porch, not wanting to go back inside until they got rid of the body. You couldn’t stomach what you did..

Watching as Namjoon conversed with his men for a few moments before they charged in the house beneath you and Jungkook, he soon followed. “You say this was one of Yoongi’s?” Namjoon sighed as he stepped in front of Jungkook. He simply nodded, shifting his head to the car next to theirs.

 “Look inside the car. Looks like the guy had plans of returning after whatever he was gonna do here..” Jungkook notified as he shuffled his feet. Namjoon just nodded before waving a guy over to the car. 

“Y/N.. Look I know I’m probably the last face you wanna see right now..” Namjoon wavered, fearing that you’d blow up on him. “But I just wanted to say I’m glad you’re okay kid.” He slowly inched towards you, resting his hand on your shoulder. 

He actually felt shitty that he had brought this upon you. You just nodded and let your head fall into Jungkook’s chest.

“Alright I’ve just arrived boss.” He spoke over the ear piece. He surveyed the building carefully, making mental note of every exit he could see. He noticed the lights shut off upstairs, meaning they were already aware of his presence. 

“Good. Don’t mess this up. Make it quick. In and out. She’s all you’re there for.” He nodded mentally before stepping out the car onto the driveway with his gun already out.

Sliding a window open, he quickly climbed inside, turning against it so he wouldn’t leave his back vulnerable. He had landed in what seemed to be the living room. 

Taking in note of his surroundings, he noticed the staircase leading to upstairs, figuring that’s where you’d be. “Alright I’m in. I’m checking first level then moving up.” He whispered over the ear piece. 

Stalking around the kitchen, office, bathroom, and such downstairs, he found it empty. Was Jungkook not here? Because surely if he was, he would’ve made himself present by now. Oh well, makes my job easier.. He chuckled to himself as he slowly stalked up the stairs.

Looking down the narrow hallway, there was only about 4 rooms you could hide in, and a closet that looked beyond small, so he headed for the rooms first. 

However, hearing a small gasp come from the narrow hideaway, he smirked. Stopping just inches away from the handle, he listened in closely before ripping the door open to reveal your fragile figure.

Following hot on your trail as you made a dash for the stairs, he was quick to shoot his foot out, hearing a loud thump follow as you fell down the steps. 

Running down them after you, he quickly fired a shot into the wall, barely missing your head as you scrambled for that knife. Stupid bitch… He could only think to himself.

Turning the corner of the kitchen island, he quickly pounced on top of you, trailing the gun up your body trying to work you into submission when you suddenly got the upper hand, quite literally. He grunted as you forced his hand up, taking out one of the kitchen lights, bracing his face to avoid the falling glass shards. 

Feeling as if his leg had been set on fire, he quickly applied pressure to the wound on his thigh, growing angrier and angrier by the minute as he also watched you reach for that stupid knife once more.

 Knowing if he couldn’t work you into submission while you were conscious, he reached for his gun again and shot his hand out to grab you, landing a clean laceration to the palm of his hand. “You Bitch!” He called out as he hissed in pain.

But what happened next was something he never thought would be his fate. You had finally gathered enough courage to strike back, plunging the knife in and out of his body. 

He felt his body growing weaker and weaker as each stab became more and more of a fight to keep alive. But on the last few stabs, his body had lost and he registered completely still.

“Dammit!” Yoongi raged as he slammed his ear piece down on his desk, shattering it to pieces. He couldn’t believe everything he had just heard. One of his men, dead, at the hands of you.

 It almost made Yoongi laugh in hysterics, but then again this only meant reconstruction for his plans. Calling in his other reinforcements, he lined up a proposal for each and every one of them. 

Watching as they all filed into his office, Yoongi smirked knowing damn well this was only a minor set back. “Back to the drawing board boys..” He announced as they all seated..

Sitting outside in pure silence for about 20 minutes was making you extremely anxious. You watched as Jungkook conversed with Namjoon as they stood outside that unfamiliar vehicle as his men searched it. 

What did he think of you..? Does he still love me..? How could anyone after this.. You let a million questions wander in your mind before one of Namjoon’s men stepped outside alerting everyone. “Namjoon it’s done.” He announced. 

Jungkook turned nodding to the man before turning and walking back to you. “Hey.. let’s go back inside. I’ll get you cleaned up.” Jungkook softly spoke. You just followed behind him as you made your way back up the porch and inside as Namjoon and his men left.

Standing inside the bathroom as Jungkook started up a shower for you both, you still stood completely numb to it all. “Alright.. Let’s get you cleaned up.” Jungkook somewhat mumbled as he rid himself of his shirt. You still stood completely still as he stalked up to you. 

He let his hands linger around your waist, not wanting to lift your shirt just yet if you weren’t comfortable. “Y/N please talk to me.” Jungkook pleaded as he searched your face for any sort of emotion. You could see the hurt in his eyes, but you were still too scared. 

“Just say something. Please. Anything.” He let his arms fall to his side in defeat. Watching as you still stood vacant, he sighed and turned around to head for the door. 

“Wait.” You quickly chimed. Even if you didn’t want to talk, you still needed him here with you. “I’ll talk.. I’ll talk.. Just don’t leave me please..” You stuttered as your fidgeted with your shirt.

“I won’t leave you…” Jungkook responded quickly as he made he was back over towards you. You slowly began to peel your bloody shirt off, but struggled with the cuts on your arms. 

“Here..” Jungkook whispered from behind you as he helped you lift it off with ease. The 2 of you just stood against each other for a moment before Jungkook spoke against your neck. “I’d never leave you.. And that’s a promise.” He spoke muffled into your skin as he left small butterfly kisses along the way. 

“I know.. I know you’re scared right now. And you think you’re some monster..” You closed your eyes at his words. It sounded even worse coming from him than it did in your own head.

“But you aren’t. You did it to survive Y/N.” He turned you around to face him. “It’s like you told me.. Just because you were dealt some bad cards doesn’t mean it defines you.” He pulled you into his bare chest, letting his hand rest on the back of your head. 

“I can’t stop thinking about it..” You broke down. “He was already dead and.. And I couldn’t stop myself. I felt as if he would just come back and kill me and..” Jungkook pulled your head back to face him and pressed a soft kiss to your lips. 

You froze at the sudden contact, but slowly eased into it before he pulled away. “You did what you had to do.. And I’m sorry I couldn’t have been there sooner.. I went to check the perimeter outside but once I heard your screams..” Jungkook closed his eyes as if the memory had pained him. 

“I thought..” He choked up on his own words and you could see tears welling in his eyes. “I thought I lost you.. And it would’ve been my fault for leaving you there..” Jungkook murmured as he pulled you into him once more.

“You didn’t lose me.. It’s okay..” You consoled as you rubbed your hands up and down his back. It’s usually what you did to calm him down when you two cuddled. 

Slowly letting your arms fall as Jungkook pulled back to cup your face, you looked him in the eyes. “You know how much I love you right..?” Jungkook sniffled as he softly rubbed his thumb against your cheek once more. 

“Even like this?” You let a small smile break as he had seemingly forgotten about your appearance. “Even like this.” He leaned down, pressing a kiss to your lips once more. “Now how about that shower?” He smiled as he pressed one more short kiss to your lips.

Laying back in bed now with a new change of clothes and being ridden of the blood that coated your body, you clung tightly to Jungkook. You rested your head on his chest as his arm snaked around your waist holding you in close.

 You both lied still against one another in the dark, listening in closely to the soft sound of each other’s breathing. Listening as your head rose up and down in sync on his chest, you turned over slightly and pressed a small kiss to his chest. 

“I love you.” You mumbled into the fabric of his shirt. “So much..” You deeply inhaled the scent of him as you began to close your eyes. “I love you more.” Jungkook chimed back, as he ran his hands through your hair. 

“I’ll always be here and I’ll always love you no matter what Y/N.” He breathed out as exhaustion fully took over and he inevitably drifted to sleep with you alongside him, safe.

Waking up and reading the clock, 2:45AM, You figured you better get a move on now. Glancing up from your spot beneath him, you watched as Jungkook slept soundly. 

His lips slightly parted, his hair messy and covering his face, his chest rising and falling in sync. It pained you. It pained you to leave him. You didn’t want to. You wanted to stay and be with him for the rest of your life, but you couldn’t.

Slowly unhinging yourself from his arms, you let your feet fall against the carpeted floor and took a deep breath. Grabbing the small suitcase you found in that closet and shoved under the bed the night before, you slowly slid it out, and began to throw in whatever articles of clothing you could. 

Rummaging through the closet as quietly as you could, you came across one of Jungkook’s jackets. Slowly pulling it off the hanger, you held it delicately in your hands and pressed it against your face taking in the smell of him. Letting out a shaky breath as you did so. 

You decided you’d take it with you. Slipping it on over your frame, you zipped it up to hold it as close to your frame as possible. Something to remind you why you were doing this and that you would come back.

Zipping up the suitcase and setting it in the hallway, you quietly made your way back into the room with a pad of paper and a pen. Sitting on the floor at the edge of the bed, you began to write.

Wiping the tears that had began to drip down your face, you carefully rose from the floor and set the pen and paper on the nightstand next to Jungkook’s sleeping figure. 

Quickly wiping your tears, you neared the edge of the bed and pressed a gentle kiss to his forehead. “I love you so much.” You whispered before brushing some of the hair out of his face and backing away.

Not daring to turn around in fear of breaking down, you quietly and quickly exited the room, grabbing your suitcase and the spare keys to one of the cars in the garage. Making your way down the stairs, you let your eyes glance over at the spot where you had killed the man earlier, forcing yourself to face it to know why you were doing this.

Slamming the trunk shut as you loaded your suitcase, you walked around the car, climbing into the driver’s seat. 

Taking in a deep breath as you started the car, you began to reverse out of the driveway, taking in the house one more time, letting your eyes stop on the bedroom window. You really hoped to come back to him. Just like how things were in the beginning.

Taking off down the road, the house just became a mere image in the rearview mirror. Recalling the note you wrote to Jungkook, you let the tears freely fall now, as you knew you couldn’t come back to him this time.

Dear Jungkook,

When you read this you will know I’m gone. And I’m so deeply sorry. I really am. I wish I could be with you. I wish I could be in your arms once more. I wish there could still be an us.

I am writing this to let you know I have left. And I’m not quite sure where to, but I know I’ll be okay. I am so grateful for everything you’ve taught me and the unconditional love you’ve shown me. I won’t forget it or you. You’ve come to be the absolute love of my life despite the situation we were put into. You are the most strongest and beautiful person I know and I’m gonna need you to stay that way, okay? So please don’t worry about me.. Worry about making things right with Namjoon and Yoongi. Worry about making a future that’s safe for you. I know you can do it. I need to take some time to myself and figure out some things. But, I hope that when I return you’ll still be there for me with open arms. No matter how long it may take, or how many obstacles I may run into, I will come back to you. You did it for me, as I will for you. I love you so so so much Jeon Jungkook. Thank you for loving me. I hope to see you soon.”

- Love, Y/N

“I know.. I know you’re scared right now. And you think you’re some monster..” You closed your eyes at his words. It sounded even worse coming from him than it did in your own head.

“But you aren’t. You did it to survive Y/N.” He turned you around to face him. “It’s like you told me.. Just because you were dealt some bad cards doesn’t mean it defines you.” He pulled you into his bare chest, letting his hand rest on the back of your head. 

“I can’t stop thinking about it..” You broke down. “He was already dead and.. And I couldn’t stop myself. I felt as if he would just come back and kill me and..” Jungkook pulled your head back to face him and pressed a soft kiss to your lips. 

You froze at the sudden contact, but slowly eased into it before he pulled away. “You did what you had to do.. And I’m sorry I couldn’t have been there sooner.. I went to check the perimeter outside but once I heard your screams..” Jungkook closed his eyes as if the memory had pained him. 

“I thought..” He choked up on his own words and you could see tears welling in his eyes. “I thought I lost you.. And it would’ve been my fault for leaving you there..” Jungkook murmured as he pulled you into him once more.

“You didn’t lose me.. It’s okay..” You consoled as you rubbed your hands up and down his back. It’s usually what you did to calm him down when you two cuddled. 

Slowly letting your arms fall as Jungkook pulled back to cup your face, you looked him in the eyes. “You know how much I love you right..?” Jungkook sniffled as he softly rubbed his thumb against your cheek once more. 

“Even like this?” You let a small smile break as he had seemingly forgotten about your appearance. “Even like this.” He leaned down, pressing a kiss to your lips once more. “Now how about that shower?” He smiled as he pressed one more short kiss to your lips.

Laying back in bed now with a new change of clothes and being ridden of the blood that coated your body, you clung tightly to Jungkook. You rested your head on his chest as his arm snaked around your waist holding you in close.

 You both lied still against one another in the dark, listening in closely to the soft sound of each other’s breathing. Listening as your head rose up and down in sync on his chest, you turned over slightly and pressed a small kiss to his chest. 

“I love you.” You mumbled into the fabric of his shirt. “So much..” You deeply inhaled the scent of him as you began to close your eyes. “I love you more.” Jungkook chimed back, as he ran his hands through your hair. 

“I’ll always be here and I’ll always love you no matter what Y/N.” He breathed out as exhaustion fully took over and he inevitably drifted to sleep with you alongside him, safe.

Waking up and reading the clock, 2:45AM, You figured you better get a move on now. Glancing up from your spot beneath him, you watched as Jungkook slept soundly. 

His lips slightly parted, his hair messy and covering his face, his chest rising and falling in sync. It pained you. It pained you to leave him. You didn’t want to. You wanted to stay and be with him for the rest of your life, but you couldn’t.

Slowly unhinging yourself from his arms, you let your feet fall against the carpeted floor and took a deep breath. Grabbing the small suitcase you found in that closet and shoved under the bed the night before, you slowly slid it out, and began to throw in whatever articles of clothing you could. 

Rummaging through the closet as quietly as you could, you came across one of Jungkook’s jackets. Slowly pulling it off the hanger, you held it delicately in your hands and pressed it against your face taking in the smell of him. Letting out a shaky breath as you did so. 

You decided you’d take it with you. Slipping it on over your frame, you zipped it up to hold it as close to your frame as possible. Something to remind you why you were doing this and that you would come back.

Zipping up the suitcase and setting it in the hallway, you quietly made your way back into the room with a pad of paper and a pen. Sitting on the floor at the edge of the bed, you began to write.

Wiping the tears that had began to drip down your face, you carefully rose from the floor and set the pen and paper on the nightstand next to Jungkook’s sleeping figure. 

Quickly wiping your tears, you neared the edge of the bed and pressed a gentle kiss to his forehead. “I love you so much.” You whispered before brushing some of the hair out of his face and backing away.

Not daring to turn around in fear of breaking down, you quietly and quickly exited the room, grabbing your suitcase and the spare keys to one of the cars in the garage. Making your way down the stairs, you let your eyes glance over at the spot where you had killed the man earlier, forcing yourself to face it to know why you were doing this.

Slamming the trunk shut as you loaded your suitcase, you walked around the car, climbing into the driver’s seat. 

Taking in a deep breath as you started the car, you began to reverse out of the driveway, taking in the house one more time, letting your eyes stop on the bedroom window. You really hoped to come back to him. Just like how things were in the beginning.

Taking off down the road, the house just became a mere image in the rearview mirror. Recalling the note you wrote to Jungkook, you let the tears freely fall now, as you knew you couldn’t come back to him this time.

Dear Jungkook,

When you read this you will know I’m gone. And I’m so deeply sorry. I really am. I wish I could be with you. I wish I could be in your arms once more. I wish there could still be an us.

I am writing this to let you know I have left. And I’m not quite sure where to, but I know I’ll be okay. I am so grateful for everything you’ve taught me and the unconditional love you’ve shown me. I won’t forget it or you. You’ve come to be the absolute love of my life despite the situation we were put into. You are the most strongest and beautiful person I know and I’m gonna need you to stay that way, okay? So please don’t worry about me.. Worry about making things right with Namjoon and Yoongi. Worry about making a future that’s safe for you. I know you can do it. I need to take some time to myself and figure out some things. But, I hope that when I return you’ll still be there for me with open arms. No matter how long it may take, or how many obstacles I may run into, I will come back to you. You did it for me, as I will for you. I love you so so so much Jeon Jungkook. Thank you for loving me. I hope to see you soon.”

- Love, Y/N

“Just trust me Y/N please..” He said placing his forehead against yours.

“I..” You began, but paused when the sound of car pulling up outside startled you both. “Who’s - ..?”        

     “Y/N kill the lights.. now.”

It was never a good sign when Jungkook was uneasy. If it was something he was scared about, it only meant 10x worse for you. So when he told you turn out the lights upon the arrival of some unknown vehicle, you felt your anxiety go through the roof.

“Who’s..” You questioned as you quickly tiptoed over and shut the light off as Jungkook shut the balcony door and slid the lock shut. “I don’t know. We need to hide. I’ll kill the lights downstairs with the power box in the hall.” Jungkook deadpanned as he quickly disappeared into the hallway, leaving you standing bewildered. 

You turned your head frantically trying to locate a spot to hide as you heard the door to the car slam shut outside. “Y/N come on!” Jungkook whisper-yelled as he stuck his head in the doorway. You blinked a few times before wandering over towards him.

He quickly grabbed your wrist and pulled you down the hallway towards a storage closet when a black blur zoomed past the 2 of you down the stairs, causing you both to back into the walls on either side. 

Feeling as if all air had left your body at that moment, you carefully swung the closet door open and climbed inside, hiding behind a stack of blankets. Looking around, there was barely enough room for you, let alone Jungkook. 

“Uhh.. Okay here I can move these over and sit in them so you can get in.” You whispered as you reached for Jungkook’s hand as he still glared down the staircase.

“No.. I’ll hide somewhere else.” He answered flatly. “There’s no way we will both fit in there. I’ll find somewhere to hide in these rooms.” Jungkook quickly explained as he leaned down to cup your face in his hands. “Whatever you do, do NOT move. I will come back and get you when it’s safe.” Jungkook pleaded. 

He knew you would argue and beg to go with him but he couldn’t afford you getting caught for his sake. “But..” “No Y/N. Please.. Just listen-” Jungkook was cut off by the sound of glass shattering downstairs. 

Pressing a quick kiss to your temple, Jungkook pulled his gun from his waistband, closed the closet door behind him and headed for the stairs. All you could do was watch through the small slots in the door.

Itching to figure out who it was and what was going on, you slowly inched towards the door and got ready to peer down the stairs when a flash of black shot past, causing you to gasp and fly back into the closet.

Your eyes grew wide as you could make out the silhouette of a gun in his hand as he seemingly just stood eyeing the closet as if he could see right through it. Your breathing grew heavy and you tried everything to slow it down, but once the door was ripped open, exposing you to the moonlight and figure, your adrenaline took over.

Watching as he picked up his gun and aimed it at your abdomen, you used all your strength to push his hand up, and he fired at the ceiling light, causing millions of glass shards to come raining down on the both of you.

Buying yourself some time with the glass shards, you picked up a large chunk and stuck it directly into his thigh. Hearing his blood curdling screams as he immediately retreated, you turned on your stomach, crawling for the knife, cutting your arms in the process. 

Just as you felt the material of the handle of the knife touch your fingertips, you gripped it tightly in your hand, turning and landing a clean slash to the man’s hand as he made an attempt to reach for you once more. 

“You bitch!” He seethed as he reached for his gun once more, but you were quicker this time. Letting out screams of anger, you lost it completely. You charged directly for the man, landing several stabs and lacerations to his abdomen and chest.
